text:

creator: pcalhoun@nnsu.com
sandygao@ca.ibm.com
text:
Hi Paul. This is not a bug of Xerces, otherwise we wouldn't be able to compile 
it and build the jar file. This is (99%) a classpath problem. You can try to 
fix it by putting xerces.jar as the first one in the classpath.
